Subjects receive conventional synthetic DMARD ( csDMARD ) therapy great equal 3 month stable dose great equal 4 week prior first dose study drug . The following csDMARDs allow : Methotrexate ( MTX ) , sulfasalazine , hydroxychloroquine , chloroquine , leflunomide . Meets follow minimum disease activity criterion : great equal 6 swollen joint ( base 66 joint count ) great equal 6 tender joint ( base 68 joint count ) Screening Baseline Visits .
